website_summaries.verdict: The classic Chuck Taylor All Star’s iconic mid-top design is given an edgy take with some of the latest updates, bestowing the modified “Street” version with a little more attitude. These Chucks are infused with an added dose of texture and padding for that modern flair and comfort. Although there are a few cons to the sneaker, one will still be confidently hitting the streets in style with this classic-looking pair on.
pros: According to more than half of the buying public, this updated version of the Converse Chuck Taylor is an excellent buy
They are a really comfortable pair to wear, as some testers have experienced
Many prefer these mid-top sneakers as they look better than the high tops and low tops
A handful of reviews have stated that the kicks are of very good quality
These classic shoes are stylish and quite fashion-forward, based on some wearers
As what others have observed, this Converse sneak’s colorways are pretty awesome
The All-Star Street Mid sneakers are very pleasing to look at
It is overall a good shoe with nice features, as per a lot of Converse fans
cons: A great number of purchasers have noticed that the laces are not long enough to tie in the traditional way
There is not much arch support, based on a certain user
Plenty of wearers have claimed that the pair generally requires a break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! It's sorta like a boot. These sneakers are unisex I wear a 9.5 in women and 7.5 in men. I ordered 7.5 and they fit perfect. So, if you're a woman order 2 sizes down and a man order your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Runderwood

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Solid leather shoe with a legit boot sole. Shoe/Boot hybrid. The el Camino of footwear. Exactly what I needed. Leather mid rise keeps my ankles secure. I always swap to orthotic insoles, and these were very standard with the swap. They fit like every Chuck Taylor and the sole slips less than standard chucks except on wet smooth concrete surfaces (they tend to slip on a couple of the sidewalks with exposed rocks, when raining- when dry, no slippage noted) love these, would buy more in other colors if they had my size. My favorite CTAS to date-
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Blister
customer_reviews.text: I love, love the look of these and really wanted them to work. I tried on different thickness of socks, tried not tieing them all the way up, etc. But they still started to rub a blister on my ankle after taking a short walk in them. The problem might be that I am a woman with small ankles, that is the only thing I could think of because otherwise they seemed to fit fine. I ordered a 6 as a size 8 woman...really wished they worked :-(. Returning was was super easy though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Out of box comfort
customer_reviews.text: I swear these were custom made for me. Absolutely the best fit I've ever had right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: omar garza

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe gone bad
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfortable and fit well but less than 2 weeks of casual use they separated at the seam
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was the first pair of shoes I bought online, which to say I was very worried. But much to my surprise they were a perfect fit and I am very much satisfied with this purchase. Great pair of shoes at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Attebery

customer_reviews.title: A fine addition to the collection
customer_reviews.text: These kicks came exactly as described and matched up with the pictures I saw perfectly. I bought them for casual cold weather and they did not disappoint! Just don’t expect them to make it in all cold weather conditions
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and being as I work at a coffee shop I needed something that would keep hot liquids out. It works great for that. Super easy to get on and off and very comfortable even after 8 hours on your feet. Also really amazing for people who are accident prone like myself. They are super slip resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Not what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the all leather high tops. These were not the ones i wanted. I gave them a try but they were too stiff to move around in and the ankle was cutting into my skin. They were okay, just not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Shama

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I love the color and they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Norma C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Looks cool, fits as it should, n they r comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Laura Yoder

product_meta.title: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Leather Street Mid Top Sneaker
product_meta.description: True colors. Just enough edge. Modern updates and remixed color blocking gives the chuck taylor all star street mid sneaker a little more attitude. The iconic mid-top design gets an added dose of comfort with a blend of leather and suede, plus additional padding in the collar and tongue. Inner elastic tongue secures the fit. Speed lace and speckle turn it up a notch. The cushioned Ortholite insole takes comfort to the next level. Unstoppable.
feature_bullets: Mid-top leather sneaker boot with Suede accents
Padded collar and tongue with warm lining
Ortholite insole helps keep it comfortable
